name: SUPER ROCKET MONKEY
description:
Ooo aa AAA ooo AAA! Embark an epic adventure in this original Top Down Foddian experience that will put your supreme gaming abilities to the test. Can YOU gain control of this Monkey and his explosive propulsion device?

Controls: 

Left Click to Move 

Use the mouse to Aim

Press Space to Use your Binoculars

Big Thanks to Munkie Beets for the music!

This game was created from start to finish in 10 Days for the 2021 Ludwig Jam.

The Web Build of the game has a slight performance issue. If you are experiencing  low framerates please try the downloaded version.

Link to Gameplay footage & Text Document for the judges

Hope you all enjoy! Good Luck :)
